title: Open a documentation pull request
contents:
mode_edit

打开文档 Pull Requestlink

Open a documentation pull requestlink

本主题介绍如何打开请求将文档更新添加到 angular/angular 存储库的 Pull Request。

This topic describes how to open the pull request that requests your documentation update to be added to the angular/angular repo.

这些步骤是在你的 Web 浏览器中执行的。

These steps are performed in your web browser.

  1. 定位要用于 Pull Request 的 working 分支。在此示例中，test-1 是 working 分支的名称。选择这些选项之一以打开 Pull Request。

    Locate the working branch that you want to use for your pull request. In this example, test-1 is the name of the working branch. Choose one of these options to open a pull request.

    1. 如果你最近将要使用的分支推送到 origin 存储库，你可能会看到它在你的 GitHub 帐户的 angular 存储库的代码页上列出。此图显示了一个最近有几次更新的存储库示例。

      If you recently pushed the branch that you want to use to the origin repo, you might see it listed on the code page of the angular repo in your GitHub account. This image shows an example of a repo that has had several recent updates.

      在与你的 working 分支的警报消息中，单击比较&Pull Request以打开 Pull Request 并继续下一步。

      In the alert message with your working branch, click Compare & pull request to open a pull request and continue to the next step.

    2. 你还可以在原始存储库的代码页中选择你的 working 分支。

      You can also select your working branch in the code page of the origin repo.

      单击 "This branch is" 消息中的链接文本以打开“比较更改”页面。

      Click the link text in the "This branch is" message to open the Comparing changes page.

      在比较更改页面中，单击创建 Pull Request以打开新的 Pull Request 页面。

      In the Comparing changes page, click Create pull request to open the new pull request page.

    3. 查看并完成评论字段中的表格。大多数文档更新都需要响应用箭头标出并在下面描述的条目。

      Review and complete the form in the comment field. Most documentation updates require responses to the entries noted by an arrow and described below.

  1. 提交信息遵循我们的指南

    The commit message follows our guidelines

    当你确定提交消息的格式正确时，请标记此评论。请记住，提交消息和拉取请求标题是不同的。有关提交消息格式的更多信息，请参阅为拉取请求准备文档更新和提交消息格式。

    Mark this comment when you're sure your commit messages are in the correct format. Remember that the commit messages and the pull request title are different. For more information about commit message formatting, see Preparing a documentation update for a pull request and Commit message format.

  2. 文档已添加/更新（用于错误修复/功能）

    Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features)

    标记此评论以表明文档已更新。

    Mark this comment to show that documentation has been updated.

  3. 文档内容变更

    Documentation content changes

    标记此评论以标识这是文档拉取请求。如果你还更新了其他类型的内容，你也可以标记这些内容。

    Mark this comment to identify this is a documentation pull request. If you also updated other types of content, you can mark those as well.

  4. 目前的行为是什么？

    What is the current behavior?

    在你在此拉取请求中进行更改之前，简要描述文档中的哪些内容不起作用或不正确。如果问题在问题中有所描述，请在此处添加问题编号。

    Briefly describe what wasn't working or what was incorrect in the documentation before you made the changes in this pull request. Add the issue number here, if the problem is described in an issue.

  5. 什么是新行为？

    What is the new behavior?

    简要描述为解决问题而添加的内容。

    Briefly describe what was added to fix the problem.

  6. 此 PR 是否引入了重大更改？

    Does this PR introduce a breaking change?

    对于大多数文档更新，答案应该是 No。

    For most documentation updates, the answer to this should be No.

  7. 其他信息

    Other information

    在此处添加可以帮助审阅者理解你的拉取请求的任何其他信息。

    Add any other information that can help reviewers understand your pull request here.

  1. 单击草稿 Pull Request旁边的箭头，并选择要创建草稿 Pull Request 还是 Pull Request。

    Click the arrow next to Draft pull request and select whether you want to create a draft pull request or a pull request.

    1. Pull Request 草案会运行持续集成（CI）测试，但不会将 Pull Request 发送给审阅者。你可以通过向人们发送 Pull Request 链接来让他们查看它。你可以用此选项来查看你的 Pull Request 如何在将其发送以供审核之前通过 CI 测试。无法合并草稿 Pull Request。

      A draft pull request runs the continuous integration (CI) testing, but does not send the pull request to reviewers. You can ask people to review it by sending them the pull request link. You might use this option to see how your pull request passes the CI testing before you send it for review to be merged. Draft pull requests cannot be merged.

    2. Pull Request 运行持续集成（CI）测试，并将你的 Pull Request 发送给审阅者以查看和合并。

      A pull request runs the continuous integration (CI) testing and sends your pull request to reviewers to review and merge.

      NOTE:
      You can change draft pull requests to pull requests.

  2. 单击创建 Pull Request或草稿 Pull Request以打开 Pull Request。在 GitHub 创建 Pull 请求后，浏览器会打开新的 Pull Request 页面。

    Click Create the pull request or Draft pull request to open the pull request. After GitHub creates the pull request, the browser opens the new pull request page.

  3. 打开 Pull Request 后，自动测试开始运行。

    After you open the pull request, the automated tests start running.

打开 Pull Request 后会发生什么link

What happens after you open a pull requestlink

在大多数情况下，通过自动化测试的文档 Pull Request 会在几天内获得批准。

In most cases, documentation pull requests that pass the automated tests are approved within a few days.

有时，审阅者会建议你进行更改以改进你的 Pull Request。在这种情况下，请查看建议并使用注释或更新的文件更新 Pull Request。

Sometimes, reviewers suggest changes for you to make to improve your pull request. In those case, review the suggestions and update the pull request with a comment or an updated file.

被放弃的 Pull Request 会发生什么link

What happens to abandoned pull requestslink

虽然回复评论可能需要几天时间，但请尝试尽快回复。似乎被放弃或忽略的 Pull Request 会根据此时间表关闭：

While it can take a few days to respond to comments, try to respond as quickly as you can. Pull requests that appear to abandoned or ignored are closed according to this schedule:

  • 在最后一条评论后 14 天不活动后，作者会被提醒此 Pull Request 有待处理的评论

    After 14 days of inactivity after the last comment, the author is reminded that the pull request has pending comments

  • 在最后一条评论后 28 天不活动后，Pull Request 已关闭并且不会合并

    After 28 days of inactivity after the last comment, the pull request is closed and not merged

最后复查时间：10/12/2022
